'''Daniel''' is the father of [[Michael (In Which Addison Has a Very Casual Get Together)|Michael]].

==History==
Daniel came into the practice with his wife, Catherine, after their son went missing. They had checked all his usual places and asked Cooper if he'd been back to the practice. Daniel said he was going to go back to the school to check again and Cooper agreed to join the search.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Catherine]].

===Familial===
His son, Michael, disappeared after being beaten up by his best friend after Michael asked him out on a date.
